changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRElement.OPVersion, dbo.CRElement.OPID, dbo.OPInformation.Name, dbo.CRElement.ElementType, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter.MateriNumber, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Units.UnitName, dbo.CRElement.State, dbo.CRElement.UnitID, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID FROM dbo.Units CROSS JOIN dbo.CRElement INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe INNER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID ON dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID ON dbo.CRElement.ControlRecipeID = dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID CROSS JOIN dbo.Parameter CROSS JOIN dbo.OPInformation

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRElement.OPVersion, dbo.CRElement.OPID, dbo.CRElement.ElementType, dbo.CRElement.State, dbo.CRElement.UnitID, dbo.OPInformation.Name, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.CRParameter.MateriNumber, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.CRElement.ParentID FROM dbo.CRElement INNER JOIN dbo.OPInformation ON dbo.CRElement.OPID = dbo.OPInformation.OPInfoID AND dbo.CRElement.OPVersion = dbo.OPInformation.Version INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter ON dbo.CRElement.ControlRecipeID = dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.CRElement.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID WHERE (dbo.CRElement.ElementType = 3) AND (dbo.CRElement.State = 302) OR (dbo.CRElement.ElementType = 2)

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.Areas.AreaName, dbo.Cells.CellName, dbo.Units.UnitName, dbo.Units.State, dbo.CRElement.Starttime, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.Units.UnitID, dbo.Units.Type, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx FROM dbo.CRElement RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Areas INNER JOIN dbo.Cells ON dbo.Areas.AreaID = dbo.Cells.AreaID INNER JOIN dbo.UnitCell ON dbo.Cells.CellID = dbo.UnitCell.CellID INNER JOIN dbo.Units ON dbo.UnitCell.UnitID = dbo.Units.UnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.UnitsUsedInfo ON dbo.Units.UnitID = dbo.UnitsUsedInfo.UnitID ON dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID = dbo.UnitsUsedInfo.CtrRecpID ON dbo.CRElement.CRElementID = dbo.UnitsUsedInfo.UPID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.ProductionPlan.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView:
SELECT dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.ProPlanID, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MastRecpID, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.Version, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.FormulaID, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MRElementID, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.ParameterID, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MaterialID, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MateriNumber, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.ParaValue, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, ISNULL(dbo.MRElement.Name, '') + ISNULL(dbo.HMRElement.Name, '') AS MROPName, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.TankName, dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.AgentParaType, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.MRElement.Name AS OPName, dbo.HMRElement.Name AS HOPName, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.DataType
FROM dbo.ThirdpartMaterial LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MRElement ON dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MRElementID = dbo.MRElement.MRElementID AND dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.Version = dbo.MRElement.Version INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HMRElement ON dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.MRElementID = dbo.HMRElement.MRElementID AND dbo.ThirdpartMaterial.Version = dbo.HMRElement.Version

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.AlertLog.AlertLogID, dbo.AlertLog.AlertTime, dbo.AlertLog.HandleStatus, dbo.AlertLog.AlertDescID, dbo.AlertLog.LocationDesc, dbo.AlertLog.ObjectIdentity, dbo.AlertDescription.AlertType, dbo.AlertDescription.[Level], dbo.AlertDescription.Description_ZH, dbo.AlertDescription.Description_EN, dbo.AlertDescription.Description_DE FROM dbo.AlertLog INNER JOIN dbo.AlertDescription ON dbo.AlertLog.AlertDescID = dbo.AlertDescription.AlertDescID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.NetworkNode.ComputerName, dbo.NetworkNode.IP1, dbo.NetworkNode.IP2, dbo.NetworkNode.IP3, dbo.NetworkNode.Type, dbo.NetworkNode.Description, dbo.NetworkNode.IsOnline, dbo.NetworkNode.State, dbo.Users.LoginName, dbo.UserGroups.GroupName FROM dbo.Users RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.LoginSate ON dbo.Users.UserID = dbo.LoginSate.UserID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.NetworkNode ON dbo.LoginSate.ComputerName = dbo.NetworkNode.ComputerName AND dbo.LoginSate.LoginModule = dbo.NetworkNode.Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.UserGroups ON dbo.Users.GroupID = dbo.UserGroups.GroupID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRBarCode.CRBarCodeID, dbo.CRBarCode.BarCode, dbo.CRBarCode.UnitTankID, dbo.CRBarCode.CtrRecpID, dbo.CRBarCode.CROPID, dbo.CRBarCode.MateriNumber, dbo.CRBarCode.MateriLOT, dbo.CRBarCode.SetValue, dbo.CRBarCode.ISDone, dbo.Units.UnitName, dbo.CRElement.Name, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx AS CtrRecpIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx AS ProPlanIDEx FROM dbo.CRBarCode INNER JOIN dbo.Units ON dbo.CRBarCode.UnitTankID = dbo.Units.UnitID INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.CRBarCode.CtrRecpID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement ON dbo.CRBarCode.CROPID = dbo.CRElement.CRElementID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRBarCodeSize.PackSizeID, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.BarCode, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.CRBarCodeID, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.Surplus, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.PackValue AS BarCodeValue, dbo.PackingSize.MaterialID, dbo.PackingSize.Number, dbo.PackingSize.LOTNumber, dbo.PackingSize.PackValue, dbo.PackingSize.SizeValue, dbo.PackingSize.SizeUnit, dbo.PackingSize.PackType FROM dbo.CRBarCodeSize LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PackingSize ON dbo.CRBarCodeSize.PackSizeID = dbo.PackingSize.PackSizeID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CRScanDataID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CROPID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CRParameterID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialLOTID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.LOTCount, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CreateTime, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.ChargeMan, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.ActualValue, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.PlanValue, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.DefineInfo, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.DefineInfoEx, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.LOTNumber, dbo.CRElement.CRElementID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe.State, dbo.ControlRecipe.MasterRecipeID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.ActualValueEx FROM dbo.CRBarcodeScanData INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement ON dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CROPID = dbo.CRElement.CRElementID INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.CRElement.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.ControlRecipe.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MaterialLOT ON dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialLOTID = dbo.MaterialLOT.MaterialLOTID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CRScanDataID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CROPID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CRParameterID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialLOTID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialID, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.LOTCount, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CreateTime, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.ChargeMan, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.ActualValue, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.PlanValue, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.DefineInfo, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.DefineInfoEx, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.LOTNumber, dbo.CRElement_HIS.CRElementID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.State, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MasterRecipeID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.ActualValueEx FROM dbo.Materials RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS INNER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID INNER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement_HIS INNER JOIN dbo.CRBarcodeScanData ON dbo.CRElement_HIS.CRElementID = dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.CROPID ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeID = dbo.CRElement_HIS.ControlRecipeID ON dbo.Materials.MaterialID = dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MaterialLOT ON dbo.CRBarcodeScanData.MaterialLOTID = dbo.MaterialLOT.MaterialLOTID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID, dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Description, dbo.Parameter.Type FROM dbo.CRParameter INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRBarCode.CRBarCodeID, dbo.CRBarCode.MateriLOT, dbo.CRBarCode.BarCode, dbo.CRBarCode.UnitTankID, dbo.CRBarCode.CtrRecpID, dbo.CRBarCode.CROPID, dbo.CRBarCode.MateriNumber, dbo.CRBarCode.SetValue, dbo.CRBarCode.ISDone, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.Surplus, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.PackValue, dbo.PackingSize.SizeValue, dbo.CRBarCodeSize.PackSizeID, dbo.CRElement.Name, dbo.Units.UnitName, dbo.PackingSize.PackType, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.CRElement.CREleDes FROM dbo.CRBarCode INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement ON dbo.CRBarCode.CROPID = dbo.CRElement.CRElementID INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.CRElement.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.Units ON dbo.CRBarCode.UnitTankID = dbo.Units.UnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRBarCodeSize ON dbo.CRBarCode.CRBarCodeID = dbo.CRBarCodeSize.CRBarCodeID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PackingSize ON dbo.CRBarCodeSize.PackSizeID = dbo.PackingSize.PackSizeID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.MasterRecipe.*, dbo.Description.Description AS MastRecpDes FROM dbo.MasterRecipe INNER JOIN dbo.Description ON dbo.MasterRecipe.DescriptionID = dbo.Description.DescriptionID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT dbo.Users.UserID, dbo.Users.LoginName, dbo.Users.Comment, dbo.IF_Bool(dbo.LoginSate.LoginSateID) AS IsOnLine, dbo.Users.GroupID FROM dbo.Users LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.LoginSate ON dbo.LoginSate.UserID = dbo.Users.UserID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.CRConditions.CRConditionID, dbo.CRConditions.CRTransitionID, dbo.CRConditions.CRParameterID, dbo.CRConditions.Operator, dbo.CRConditions.SetValue, dbo.CRConditions.TruthValue, dbo.CRConditions.Sequence, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRTransitions.CRElementID, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.CRConditions.ActualValue, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID AS CodtionCROPID, CRElement_1.Name AS CodtionOPName, CRElement_1.CREleDes AS CodtionOPDes,dbo.CRConditions.DataSource,CRElement_1.State FROM dbo.CRConditions INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter ON dbo.CRConditions.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.CRTransitions ON dbo.CRConditions.CRTransitionID = dbo.CRTransitions.CRTransitionID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement AS CRElement_1 ON dbo.CRParameter.CROPID = CRElement_1.CRElementID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.ControlRecipe.State, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.State AS PlanState, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualEndtime FROM dbo.ControlRecipe LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupName AS ProplanGroupName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID AS ProplanGroupID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ControlRecipe.AreaID, dbo.ControlRecipe.CellID, dbo.ControlRecipe.MasterRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe.MRVersion, dbo.ControlRecipe.FormulaID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe.Description, dbo.ControlRecipe.Creator, dbo.ControlRecipe.CreationTime, dbo.ControlRecipe.Priority, dbo.ControlRecipe.LastModify, dbo.ControlRecipe.Mender, dbo.ControlRecipe.State, dbo.ControlRecipe.PresentOption, dbo.ControlRecipe.Excutor, dbo.ControlRecipe.Mode, dbo.Cells.CellName, dbo.Areas.AreaName, dbo.ControlRecipe.NameStyleID, ISNULL(dbo.Formula.FormulaName, '') + ISNULL(dbo.HFormula.FormulaName, '') AS FormulaName, ISNULL(Description_1.Description, '') + ISNULL(dbo.Description.Description, '') AS MRDes, ISNULL(dbo.HMasterRecipe.MRName, '') + ISNULL(dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, '') AS MRName, Users_1.LoginName AS CreatorName, dbo.Users.LoginName AS MenderName, Users_2.LoginName AS ExcutorName, ISNULL(dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID, 0) + ISNULL(MastRecpGroup_1.GroupID, 0) AS MastRecpGroupID, ISNULL(dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupName, '') + ISNULL(MastRecpGroup_1.GroupName, '') AS MastRecpGroupName, dbo.ControlRecipe.RunMode, dbo.ControlRecipe.NameStyleFormat, dbo.ControlRecipe.ReportTName, dbo.ProductionPlan.Source, dbo.ControlRecipe.CREffectRate FROM dbo.ProPlanGroup RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID = dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Cells RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Formula RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HFormula RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup AS MastRecpGroup_1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON MastRecpGroup_1.GroupID = dbo.MasterRecipe.GroupID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.ControlRecipe.Creator = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.ControlRecipe.Mender = dbo.Users.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.ControlRecipe.Excutor = Users_2.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HMasterRecipe ON dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID = dbo.HMasterRecipe.GroupID ON dbo.ControlRecipe.MRVersion = dbo.HMasterRecipe.Version AND dbo.ControlRecipe.MasterRecipeID = dbo.HMasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID ON dbo.MasterRecipe.Version = dbo.ControlRecipe.MRVersion AND dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.MasterRecipeID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Description AS Description_1 ON dbo.HMasterRecipe.DescriptionID = Description_1.DescriptionID ON dbo.HFormula.MRVersion = dbo.ControlRecipe.MRVersion AND dbo.HFormula.FormulaID = dbo.ControlRecipe.FormulaID ON dbo.Formula.FormulaID = dbo.ControlRecipe.FormulaID AND dbo.Formula.MRVersion = dbo.ControlRecipe.MRVersion LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Areas ON dbo.ControlRecipe.AreaID = dbo.Areas.AreaID ON dbo.Cells.CellID = dbo.ControlRecipe.CellID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Description ON dbo.MasterRecipe.DescriptionID = dbo.Description.DescriptionID ON dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ProductionPlanID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupName AS ProplanGroupName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID AS ProplanGroupID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.AreaID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.CellID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MasterRecipeID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MRVersion, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.FormulaID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Description, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Creator, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.CreationTime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Priority, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.LastModify, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Mender, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.State, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PresentOption, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Excutor, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Mode, dbo.Cells.CellName, dbo.Areas.AreaName, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.NameStyleID, ISNULL(dbo.Formula.FormulaName, '') + ISNULL(dbo.HFormula.FormulaName, '') AS FormulaName, ISNULL(Description_1.Description, '') + ISNULL(dbo.Description.Description, '') AS MRDes, ISNULL(dbo.HMasterRecipe.MRName, '') + ISNULL(dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, '') AS MRName, Users_1.LoginName AS CreatorName, dbo.Users.LoginName AS MenderName, Users_2.LoginName AS ExcutorName, ISNULL(dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID, 0) + ISNULL(MastRecpGroup_1.GroupID, 0) AS MastRecpGroupID, ISNULL(dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupName, '') + ISNULL(MastRecpGroup_1.GroupName, '') AS MastRecpGroupName, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.RunMode, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.NameStyleFormat, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ReportTName, dbo.ProductionPlan.Source,dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.CREffectRate FROM dbo.ProPlanGroup RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProductionPlan ON dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID = dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Cells RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Formula RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HFormula RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup AS MastRecpGroup_1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON MastRecpGroup_1.GroupID = dbo.MasterRecipe.GroupID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Creator = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Mender = dbo.Users.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.Excutor = Users_2.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.HMasterRecipe ON dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID = dbo.HMasterRecipe.GroupID ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MRVersion = dbo.HMasterRecipe.Version AND dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MasterRecipeID = dbo.HMasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID ON dbo.MasterRecipe.Version = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MRVersion AND dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MasterRecipeID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Description AS Description_1 ON dbo.HMasterRecipe.DescriptionID = Description_1.DescriptionID ON dbo.HFormula.MRVersion = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MRVersion AND dbo.HFormula.FormulaID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.FormulaID ON dbo.Formula.FormulaID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.FormulaID AND dbo.Formula.MRVersion = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MRVersion LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Areas ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.AreaID = dbo.Areas.AreaID ON dbo.Cells.CellID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.CellID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Description ON dbo.MasterRecipe.DescriptionID = dbo.Description.DescriptionID ON dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ProductionPlanID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter.MROPID, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Parameter.Description, dbo.Parameter.ParaType, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.IsAltered, dbo.Parameter.IsTrendPoint, dbo.Parameter.IsDownLoad, dbo.Materials.MaterialID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Remark1, dbo.Materials.Remark2, dbo.Materials.Description AS MateriDescription, dbo.Materials.Unit AS MateriUnit, dbo.Path.PathName, dbo.Path.Description AS PathDes, Units_1.UnitName AS BackLinkName, dbo.Units.UnitName AS PreLinklName, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialLOTID, dbo.CRParameter.LOTNumber, dbo.CRParameter.EffectRate FROM dbo.Units RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRParameter INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Path ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath = dbo.Path.PathID ON dbo.Units.UnitID = dbo.Path.PreLink LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units AS Units_1 ON dbo.Path.BackLink = Units_1.UnitID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MROPID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialPath, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Parameter.Description, dbo.Parameter.ParaType, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.IsAltered, dbo.Parameter.IsTrendPoint, dbo.Parameter.IsDownLoad, dbo.Materials.MaterialID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Remark1, dbo.Materials.Remark2, dbo.Materials.Description AS MateriDescription, dbo.Materials.Unit AS MateriUnit, dbo.Path.PathName, dbo.Path.Description AS PathDes, Units_1.UnitName AS BackLinkName, dbo.Units.UnitName AS PreLinklName, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialLOTID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.LOTNumber, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.EffectRate FROM dbo.Units RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRParameter_HIS INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Path ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialPath = dbo.Path.PathID ON dbo.Units.UnitID = dbo.Path.PreLink LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units AS Units_1 ON dbo.Path.BackLink = Units_1.UnitID

changeSet.author: WangXun

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter.MROPID, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Parameter.Description, dbo.Parameter.ParaType, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.IsAltered, dbo.Parameter.IsTrendPoint, dbo.Parameter.IsDownLoad, dbo.Materials.MaterialID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Description AS MateriDescription, dbo.Materials.Unit AS MateriUnit, dbo.Path.PathName, Units_1.UnitName AS BackLinkName, dbo.Units.UnitName AS PreLinklName, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialLOTID, dbo.CRParameter.LOTNumber, dbo.CRParameter.EffectRate, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID FROM dbo.Units AS Units_1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRParameter LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Path ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath = dbo.Path.PathID ON dbo.Units.UnitID = dbo.Path.PreLink ON Units_1.UnitID = dbo.Path.BackLink

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter.MROPID, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Parameter.Description, dbo.Parameter.ParaType, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.IsAltered, dbo.Parameter.IsTrendPoint, dbo.Parameter.IsDownLoad, dbo.Materials.MaterialID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Description AS MateriDescription, dbo.Materials.Unit AS MateriUnit, dbo.Path.PathName, dbo.Units.UnitName AS PreLinklName, Units_1.UnitName AS BackLinkName, dbo.HParaFormula.FormulaID, dbo.HParaMaterial.ParaMaterialID, dbo.HParaFormula.Version, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID FROM dbo.CRParameter INNER JOIN dbo.HParaFormula ON dbo.CRParameter.MROPID = dbo.HParaFormula.MRElementID AND dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.HParaFormula.ParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.HParaFormula.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Path ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath = dbo.Path.PathID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units ON dbo.Path.PreLink = dbo.Units.UnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units AS Units_1 ON dbo.Path.BackLink = Units_1.UnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HParaMaterial ON dbo.HParaFormula.Version = dbo.HParaMaterial.ParaFormVersion AND dbo.HParaFormula.ParaFormulaID = dbo.HParaMaterial.ParaFormulaID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.HParaMaterial.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT CRUP.Name AS CRUPName, dbo.Units.UnitName, CROP.Name AS CROPName, CROP.ElementType, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.Unit AS ParaUnit, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ActualValue, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID, dbo.CRParameter.MateriNumber, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Description, dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath, CROP.State, dbo.CRExecution.State AS CRExecutionState FROM dbo.CRExecParaValue LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRExecution ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRExecutionID = dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRElement AS CROP INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement AS CRUP ON CROP.ParentID = CRUP.CRElementID INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter ON CROP.CRElementID = dbo.CRParameter.CROPID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units ON CRUP.UnitID = dbo.Units.UnitID WHERE (CROP.ElementType = 3) AND (dbo.Parameter.Type = 2) AND (dbo.CRParameter.MateriNumber <> N'') AND (dbo.CRParameter.MateriNumber IS NOT NULL)

changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT CRUP_HIS.Name AS CRUPName, dbo.Units.UnitName, CROP_HIS.Name AS CROPName, CROP_HIS.ElementType, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.Unit AS ParaUnit, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ParaValue, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ActualValue, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MateriNumber, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Description, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialPath, CROP_HIS.State, dbo.CRExecution.State AS CRExecutionState FROM dbo.CRExecution RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRExecParaValue ON dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID = dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRExecutionID RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRElement_HIS AS CRUP_HIS INNER JOIN dbo.CRElement_HIS AS CROP_HIS ON CRUP_HIS.CRElementID = CROP_HIS.ParentID INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter_HIS ON CROP_HIS.CRElementID = dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CROPID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CRParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units ON CRUP_HIS.UnitID = dbo.Units.UnitID WHERE (dbo.Parameter.Type = 2) AND (CROP_HIS.ElementType = 3) AND (dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MateriNumber <> N'') AND (dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MateriNumber IS NOT NULL)

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.MasterRecipeID, dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion, dbo.ProductionPlan.FormulaID, dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanName, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.SurplusOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanStarttime, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanEndtime, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualStarttime, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualEndtime, dbo.ProductionPlan.CompleteProportion, dbo.ProductionPlan.State, dbo.ProductionPlan.Creator, dbo.ProductionPlan.CreationTime, dbo.ProductionPlan.Source, dbo.ProductionPlan.LastModify, dbo.ProductionPlan.Mender, dbo.ProductionPlan.Mode, dbo.ProductionPlan.Approver, dbo.ProductionPlan.ApproveTime, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, dbo.Formula.FormulaName, dbo.ProductionPlan.NameStyleID, Users_1.LoginName AS CreatorName, Users_2.LoginName AS MenderName, dbo.Users.LoginName AS ApproverName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupName, dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID AS MastRecpGroupID, dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupName AS MastRecpGroupName, dbo.Description.Description, dbo.ProductionPlan.NameStyleFormat, dbo.ProductionPlan.Remark2, dbo.ProductionPlan.Remark1 FROM dbo.ProductionPlan INNER JOIN dbo.Formula ON dbo.ProductionPlan.MasterRecipeID = dbo.Formula.MasterRecipeID AND dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion = dbo.Formula.MRVersion AND dbo.ProductionPlan.FormulaID = dbo.Formula.FormulaID INNER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.Formula.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID AND dbo.Formula.MRVersion = dbo.MasterRecipe.Version INNER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup ON dbo.MasterRecipe.GroupID = dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID INNER JOIN dbo.Description ON dbo.MasterRecipe.DescriptionID = dbo.Description.DescriptionID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProPlanGroup ON dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID = dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Approver = dbo.Users.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Creator = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Mender = Users_2.UserID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.MasterRecipeID, dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion, dbo.ProductionPlan.FormulaID, dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanName, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.SurplusOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanStarttime, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanEndtime, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualStarttime, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualEndtime, dbo.ProductionPlan.CompleteProportion, dbo.ProductionPlan.State, dbo.ProductionPlan.Creator, dbo.ProductionPlan.CreationTime, dbo.ProductionPlan.Source, dbo.ProductionPlan.LastModify, dbo.ProductionPlan.Mender, dbo.ProductionPlan.Mode, dbo.ProductionPlan.Approver, dbo.ProductionPlan.ApproveTime, dbo.HMasterRecipe.MRName, dbo.HFormula.FormulaName, dbo.ProductionPlan.NameStyleID, Users_1.LoginName AS CreatorName, Users_2.LoginName AS MenderName, dbo.Users.LoginName AS ApproverName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupName, dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID AS MastRecpGroupID, dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupName AS MastRecpGroupName, dbo.Description.Description, dbo.ProductionPlan.NameStyleFormat, dbo.ProductionPlan.Remark2, dbo.ProductionPlan.Remark1 FROM dbo.ProductionPlan INNER JOIN dbo.HFormula ON dbo.ProductionPlan.FormulaID = dbo.HFormula.FormulaID AND dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion = dbo.HFormula.MRVersion AND dbo.ProductionPlan.MasterRecipeID = dbo.HFormula.MasterRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.HMasterRecipe ON dbo.HFormula.MasterRecipeID = dbo.HMasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID AND dbo.HFormula.MRVersion = dbo.HMasterRecipe.Version INNER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup ON dbo.HMasterRecipe.GroupID = dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID INNER JOIN dbo.Description ON dbo.HMasterRecipe.DescriptionID = dbo.Description.DescriptionID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ProPlanGroup ON dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID = dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Approver = dbo.Users.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Creator = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Mender = Users_2.UserID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRExecution.ExecutionOrder, dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRExecution.UPID, dbo.CRExecution.OPID, dbo.CRExecution.State, dbo.CRExecution.Starttime, dbo.CRExecution.Endtime, dbo.CRElement.ElementType, dbo.CRElement.Name, dbo.CRElement.CREleDes, dbo.CRElement.MRElementID, ISNULL(dbo.HOPInformation.Name, '') + ISNULL(dbo.OPInformation.Name, '') AS LIBOPNAME FROM dbo.CRElement INNER JOIN dbo.CRExecution ON dbo.CRElement.CRElementID = dbo.CRExecution.OPID AND dbo.CRElement.ControlRecipeID = dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID AND dbo.CRElement.ParentID = dbo.CRExecution.UPID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HOPInformation ON dbo.CRElement.OPID = dbo.HOPInformation.OPInfoID AND dbo.CRElement.OPVersion = dbo.HOPInformation.Version LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OPInformation ON dbo.CRElement.OPID = dbo.OPInformation.OPInfoID AND dbo.CRElement.OPVersion = dbo.OPInformation.Version

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRExecution.ExecutionOrder, dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRExecution.UPID, dbo.CRExecution.OPID, dbo.CRExecution.State, dbo.CRExecution.Starttime, dbo.CRExecution.Endtime, dbo.CRElement_HIS.ElementType, dbo.CRElement_HIS.Name, dbo.CRElement_HIS.CREleDes, dbo.CRElement_HIS.MRElementID, ISNULL(dbo.HOPInformation.Name, '') + ISNULL(dbo.OPInformation.Name, '') AS LIBOPNAME FROM dbo.CRElement_HIS INNER JOIN dbo.CRExecution ON dbo.CRElement_HIS.CRElementID = dbo.CRExecution.OPID AND dbo.CRElement_HIS.ControlRecipeID = dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID AND dbo.CRElement_HIS.ParentID = dbo.CRExecution.UPID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HOPInformation ON dbo.CRElement_HIS.OPID = dbo.HOPInformation.OPInfoID AND dbo.CRElement_HIS.OPVersion = dbo.HOPInformation.Version LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OPInformation ON dbo.CRElement_HIS.OPID = dbo.OPInformation.OPInfoID AND dbo.CRElement_HIS.OPVersion = dbo.OPInformation.Version

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRExecution.OPID, dbo.CRExecution.Starttime, dbo.CRExecution.Endtime, dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.CRExecParaValue.PlanValue, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ActualValue, dbo.CRParameter.MateriNumber, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe.PlanOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ActualEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName FROM dbo.CRExecution INNER JOIN dbo.CRExecParaValue ON dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID = dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRExecutionID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.ControlRecipe.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID WHERE (dbo.Parameter.Type = 2)

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRExecution.OPID, dbo.CRExecution.Starttime, dbo.CRExecution.Endtime, dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.CRExecParaValue.PlanValue, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ActualValue, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MateriNumber, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialID, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.PlanOutput, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualStarttime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ActualEndtime, dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeIDEx, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName FROM dbo.CRExecution INNER JOIN dbo.CRExecParaValue ON dbo.CRExecution.CRExecutionID = dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRExecutionID INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.CRParameter_HIS ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CRParameterID INNER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS ON dbo.CRExecution.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID WHERE (dbo.Parameter.Type = 2)

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRParameter.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter.MROPID, dbo.CRParameter.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Parameter.Description, dbo.Parameter.ParaType, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.IsAltered, dbo.Parameter.IsTrendPoint, dbo.Parameter.IsDownLoad, dbo.Materials.MaterialID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Remark1, dbo.Materials.Remark2, dbo.Materials.Description AS MateriDescription, dbo.Materials.Unit AS MateriUnit, dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ActualValue, dbo.CRExecParaValue.PlanValue, dbo.Path.PathName, dbo.Path.Description AS PathDes, Units_1.UnitName AS BackLinkName, dbo.Units.UnitName AS PreLinklName, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID, dbo.CRParameter.LOTNumber FROM dbo.CRExecParaValue RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRParameter INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Path ON dbo.CRParameter.MaterialPath = dbo.Path.PathID ON dbo.Units.UnitID = dbo.Path.PreLink LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units AS Units_1 ON dbo.Path.BackLink = Units_1.UnitID ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter.CRParameterID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ControlRecipeID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CRParameterID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ParaValue, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MROPID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CROPID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialPath, dbo.Parameter.ParameterID, dbo.Parameter.ParaName, dbo.Parameter.Description, dbo.Parameter.ParaType, dbo.Parameter.DataType, dbo.Parameter.Unit, dbo.Parameter.Type, dbo.Parameter.IsAltered, dbo.Parameter.IsTrendPoint, dbo.Parameter.IsDownLoad, dbo.Materials.MaterialID, dbo.Materials.Number, dbo.Materials.MaterialName, dbo.Materials.Remark1, dbo.Materials.Remark2, dbo.Materials.Description AS MateriDescription, dbo.Materials.Unit AS MateriUnit, dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRExecutionID, dbo.CRExecParaValue.ActualValue, dbo.CRExecParaValue.PlanValue, dbo.Path.PathName, dbo.Path.Description AS PathDes, Units_1.UnitName AS BackLinkName, dbo.Units.UnitName AS PreLinklName, dbo.Parameter.RelatedID, dbo.CRParameter_HIS.LOTNumber FROM dbo.CRExecParaValue RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.CRParameter_HIS INNER JOIN dbo.Parameter ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.ParameterID = dbo.Parameter.ParameterID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Materials ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialID = dbo.Materials.MaterialID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Path ON dbo.CRParameter_HIS.MaterialPath = dbo.Path.PathID ON dbo.Units.UnitID = dbo.Path.PreLink LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Units AS Units_1 ON dbo.Path.BackLink = Units_1.UnitID ON dbo.CRExecParaValue.CRParameterID = dbo.CRParameter_HIS.CRParameterID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.ReportInfo.ReportID, dbo.ReportInfo.ControlRecipeID, dbo.ReportInfo.ReportName, dbo.ReportInfo.ReportState, dbo.ReportInfo.ReportPath, ISNULL(dbo.ControlRecipe.State, 0) + ISNULL(dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.State, 0) AS State FROM dbo.ReportInfo LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe ON dbo.ReportInfo.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe.ControlRecipeID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS ON dbo.ReportInfo.ControlRecipeID = dbo.ControlRecipe_HIS.ControlRecipeID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.Users.Mender, dbo.Users.LastModify, dbo.Users.CreationTime, dbo.Users.Creator, dbo.Users.Comment, dbo.Users.Password, dbo.Users.LoginName, dbo.Users.GroupID, dbo.Users.UserID, dbo.UserGroups.GroupName, Users_1.LoginName AS CreatorName, Users_2.LoginName AS MenderrName, dbo.Users.FingerPrint, dbo.Users.SurveilleAll, dbo.IF_Bool(dbo.LoginSate.LoginSateID) AS IsOnLine FROM dbo.UserGroups INNER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.UserGroups.GroupID = dbo.Users.GroupID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.LoginSate ON dbo.Users.UserID = dbo.LoginSate.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.Users.Creator = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.Users.Mender = Users_2.UserID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.MaterialLOT.MaterialLOTID, dbo.MaterialLOT.Number, dbo.MaterialLOT.MaterialID, dbo.MaterialLOT.LOTNumber, dbo.MaterialLOT.LOTDes, dbo.MaterialLOT.Creator, dbo.MaterialLOT.CreationTime, dbo.MaterialLOT.Inspector, dbo.MaterialLOT.QCDate, dbo.MaterialLOT.Mender, dbo.MaterialLOT.LastModify, dbo.MaterialLOT.State, dbo.MaterialLOT.StorageVal, dbo.MaterialLOT.Supplier, dbo.MaterialLOT.WareHouseID, dbo.MaterialLOT.Remark1, dbo.MaterialLOT.Remark2, dbo.WareHouse.HouseDes, dbo.WareHouse.HouseName, Users_2.LoginName AS CreatorName, Users_1.LoginName AS MenderName, dbo.Users.LoginName AS InspectorName FROM dbo.WareHouse RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.MaterialLOT LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.MaterialLOT.Creator = Users_2.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.MaterialLOT.Mender = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.MaterialLOT.Inspector = dbo.Users.UserID ON dbo.WareHouse.WareHouseID = dbo.MaterialLOT.WareHouseID

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: SELECT dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupName AS MastRecpGroupName, dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupName AS ProPlanGroupName, dbo.MasterRecipe.MRName, ISNULL(dbo.Formula.FormulaName, N'') + ISNULL(dbo.HFormula.FormulaName, N'') AS FormulaName, Users_1.LoginName AS CreatorName, dbo.Users.LoginName AS MenderName, Users_2.LoginName AS ApproverName, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanID, dbo.ProductionPlan.ProductionPlanIDEx, dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanName, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.SurplusOutput, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanStarttime, dbo.ProductionPlan.PlanEndtime, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualStarttime, dbo.ProductionPlan.ActualEndtime, dbo.ProductionPlan.CompleteProportion, dbo.ProductionPlan.State, dbo.ProductionPlan.CreationTime, dbo.ProductionPlan.Source, dbo.ProductionPlan.LastModify, dbo.ProductionPlan.Mode, dbo.ProductionPlan.ApproveTime, dbo.ProductionPlan.Creator, dbo.ProductionPlan.Mender, dbo.ProductionPlan.Approver FROM dbo.ProductionPlan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_1 ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Creator = Users_1.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Mender = dbo.Users.UserID INNER JOIN dbo.MasterRecipe ON dbo.ProductionPlan.MasterRecipeID = dbo.MasterRecipe.MasterRecipeID INNER JOIN dbo.ProPlanGroup ON dbo.ProductionPlan.GroupID = dbo.ProPlanGroup.GroupID INNER JOIN dbo.MastRecpGroup ON dbo.MasterRecipe.GroupID = dbo.MastRecpGroup.GroupID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Users AS Users_2 ON dbo.ProductionPlan.Approver = Users_2.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Formula ON dbo.ProductionPlan.FormulaID = dbo.Formula.FormulaID AND dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion = dbo.Formula.MRVersion LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.HFormula ON dbo.ProductionPlan.FormulaID = dbo.HFormula.FormulaID AND dbo.ProductionPlan.MRVersion = dbo.HFormula.MRVersion
